snippet.title: Tom Clancy’s The Division Dark Zone Multiplayer Reveal – E3 2015 [Europe]
snippet.description:
Discover The Division’s “Player vs. Player” enabled area: the Dark Zone. A place of fear and betrayal, located in the very heart of Manhattan, in which you can enter seamlessly and at any time.
In the Dark Zone, it’s every agent for himself: beware enemy factions and keep your eyes peeled for other Division Agents.

But why enter the Dark Zone if it’s so dangerous? Part of the answer is loot. Rare, valuable loot…


Tom Clancy's The Division, coming 08/03/2016
Pre-order now & secure your access to the Beta:
http://thedivisiongame.com/pre-order

Join us now:
Official website: http://www.thedivisiongame.com/
Facebook: http://www.thedivisiongame.com/facebook
Twitter: http://www.thedivisiongame.com/twitter
Forums: http://www.thedivisiongame.com/forums
